channel.title: Git on DI Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in Git on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: [video] – Knowledge is Power: Getting out of Trouble by Understanding Git
item.description: Have you ever wondered how git works internally or why git does certain things in a certain way? Recently I found an interesting talk about git’s internals on https://gotocon.com. It explains all the building blocks that you need to understand to better understand git. Knowledge is Power: Getting out of Trouble by Understanding Git

item.title: Video Introduction to GIT Version Control by Scott Chacon of GitHub
item.description: The following talk, given by Scott Chacon of GitHub, gives a very good introduction to the version control system GIT and its usage. This is by far the best introduction that I have found so far. (via Marakana)
